name: Christmas Holiday Cyber Attack EXTREME
description:
Note: Sometimes that play button does not work in browser. I found that if you click off of the game and back on it then try clicking play it has a chance of working.

This game was made in 4 days for the "Jame Gam Christmas Edition" game jam.

All coding and art was done by myself.

Background song done by MckayCraft

Sound effects from freesound.org

(If you don't know what to do, you have to spell "hat" in binary but shhhhh! I didn't tell you that.)
